title: CS.RIN.RU Needs Your Help
body:
Just like me, you probably know and use CS.RIN.RU for years. I’m doing since the day I started repacking. It’s clearly the best piracy forum available in the whole Internet. That’s why all my repack releases have links to game-specific threads on that site. And now CS.RIN.RU needs your help. So if in these dark times of lockdowns you have some funds to help – please do share. CS.RIN.RU must live.

You can read the statement here
